title: QE NEB Context Provider Schema
description: Schema for QENEBContextProvider that generates context data for Quantum ESPRESSO pw.x NEB input. Extends the pw.x context with image-specific atomic positions.

FIRST_IMAGE.description: Atomic positions block (ATOMIC_POSITIONS) for the first NEB image.

LAST_IMAGE.description: Atomic positions block (ATOMIC_POSITIONS) for the last NEB image.

INTERMEDIATE_IMAGES.description: Atomic positions blocks (ATOMIC_POSITIONS) for all intermediate NEB images.
